title: Lost chest and key
body:
So i opened my chest and my client crashed, i relogged and my chest and key was gone and i didnt even get skin or champion shard!
Can someone help?

replies.body: Even if you don't see the animation happening, the transaction should still reach our servers.  It looks like you unlocked 150 orange essences as well as a  Nightshade Serpent Icon.  The icon automatically unlocked, so you should see it when selecting your summoner icons pane.  Crashes like this can usually occur when using third party programs, so if you have any running like play.tv you may want to remove it.  Hopefully that helps clear things up!
